title: [jit] rearrange parser.h
body_html:
Move most of the non-trivial implementation to parser.cpp and make some stuff private. The main motivation is that I want to share some functionality between between this parser and a new IR parser and would like to hide that in a cpp file.

This also fixes an error if parser.h is included from distinct SO's. The error is caused by mergeTypesFromTypeComment being defined not-inline in a header file.

There are no actual changes to the code, just moving stuff around and running clang-format.

There are no actual changes to the code, just moving stuff around and running clang-format.
body:
Move most of the non-trivial implementation to `parser.cpp` and make some stuff private. The main motivation is that I want to share some functionality between between this parser and a new IR parser and would like to hide that in a cpp file.

This also fixes an error if `parser.h` is included from distinct SO's. The error is caused by `mergeTypesFromTypeComment` being defined not-inline in a header file.

There are no actual changes to the code, just moving stuff around and running clang-format.
